sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react' import classnames from 'classnames' import KeyFeatures from '../keyFeatures' import Gallery from '../gallery' import Map from '../map' import { asCurrency } from '../../utils/number' import styles from './styles.module.css' function ProductDetails({ listing }) { if (!listing) { return null } const { image, title, description, price, features, details } = listing const priceClasses = classnames(styles.price, 'text-success', 'text-right') return (

{title}

{description}

Priced from
£ {asCurrency(price)}
) } export default ProductDetails
